contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Observatory |name = Isaac Newton Group of Telescopes |image = [[Image:Ing telescopes sunset la palma july 2001.jpg|250px]] |caption = Part of [[Roque de los Muchachos Observatory]], including the Isaac Newton Group of Telescopes. The [[William Herschel Telescope]] is the large dome on the left, the [[Isaac Newton Telescope]] is located second from the right, and the [[Jacobus Kapteyn Telescope]] is located on the far right. |organization = |location = |coords = {{coords|28|45|43.4|N|17|52|39.5|W|display=inline,title}} |altitude = |weather = |established = |closed = |website= |telescope1_name = [[William Herschel Telescope]] |telescope1_type = Optical / infrared |telescope2_name = [[Isaac Newton Telescope]] |telescope2_type = Optical / infrared |telescope3_name = [[Jacobus Kapteyn Telescope]] |telescope3_type = Optical |telescope4_name = [[Nederlandse Organisatie voor Wetenschappelijk Onderzoek|NWO]] |telescope4_type = |telescope5_name = [[Instituto de Astrofísica de Canarias|IAC]] |telescope5_type = |telescope6_name = |telescope6_type = }} The '''Isaac Newton Group of Telescopes''' or '''ING''' operates the [[William Herschel Telescope]], [[Isaac Newton Telescope]] and [[Jacobus Kapteyn Telescope]] optical [[telescopes]] for the [[Science and Technology Facilities Council]] (STFC), the [[Nederlandse Organisatie voor Wetenschappelijk Onderzoek|NWO]] and the [[Instituto de Astrofísica de Canarias|IAC]]. The telescopes are located at [[Roque de los Muchachos Observatory]] on [[La Palma]] in the [[Canary Islands]]. These telescopes were formerly under the control of the [[Royal Greenwich Observatory]] before UK government cutbacks in 1998. ==External links== *[http://www.ing.iac.es/ ING Homepage] *[http://www.stfc.ac.uk Science and Technology Facilities Council (STFC)] *[http://www.nwo.nl/nwohome.nsf/pages/index Nederlandse Organisatie voor Wetenschappelijk Onderzoe (NWO)] *[http://www.iac.es/ Instituto de Astrofísica de Canarias (IAC)] {{DEFAULTSORT:Isaac Newton Group Of Telescopes}} [[Category:Astronomical observatories in La Palma]] {{observatory-stub}}
